1:
Why are the nations in turmoil,\q and why do the peoples make plots that will fail?
\q
2:
The kings of the earth take their stand together\q and the rulers conspire together
\q against Yahweh and against his Messiah, saying,
\q
3:
"Let us tear off the shackles they put on us\q and throw off their chains."


\q
4:
He who sits in the heavens will sneer at them;\q the Lord mocks them.
\q
5:
Then he will speak to them in his anger\q and terrify them in his rage, saying,


\q
6:
"I myself have anointed my king\q on Zion, my holy mountain."
\q
7:
I will announce a decree of Yahweh.\q He said to me, "You are my son!
\q This day I have become your father.


\q
8:
Ask me, and I will give you the nations for your inheritance\q and the farthermost regions of the earth for your possession.
\q
9:
You will break them with an iron rod;\q like a jar of a potter, you will smash them to pieces."


\q
10:
So now, you kings, be warned;\q be corrected, you rulers of the earth.
\q
11:
Worship Yahweh in fear\q and rejoice with trembling.


\q
12:
Kiss the son or he will be angry with you,\q2 and you will die in the way when his anger burns for just a moment.
\q How blessed are all those who seek refuge in him.
